short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces RedFlagDeals referral links from forum posts to their non-referral counterpart

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to strip out referral links from RedFlagDeals because I'm tired of adding temporary uBlock permissions for URL redirect links that don't even work in the end.

Most referral URLs will have the referred URL embedded somewhere as a query parameter. This extension parses all "auto linker" URLs on the forums and tries to replaces them with the found query parameter if it exists.
